Some stranded Russian Sokol oil cargoes begin to move to China, India - dataThree tankers with Russian Sokol oil that had been stranded at sea due to payment problems and Western sanctions have started to move towards China and India, data from Kpler and LSEG showed on Monday. Mon, 19 Feb 2024 16:55:52 GMT BR2CSSU2CZPHRHK5LZ3MV7S4UY https://www.reuters.com/business/energy/some-stranded-Russian-sokol-oil-cargoes-begin-move-china-india-data-2024-02-19/Reuters商业活力
All about Currys, UK chain China's JD.com and US fund Elliott vie forCurrys shares soared on Monday after Chinese online retailer JD.com joined U.S. activist investor Elliott Advisors in a battle to buy the British home appliance and electronics retailer, which has already rebuffed Elliott's 700 million pound ($881.79 million) opening bid. Mon, 19 Feb 2024 15:40:15 GMT G2LMUDUDLRJ5LLLIZESTKSMYYA https://www.reuters.com/markets/deals/all-about-currys-uk-chain-chinas-jdcom-us-fund-elliott-vie-2024-02-19/Reuters可持续发展可持续财务与报告
Messi sets record straight over Hong Kong absenceLionel Messi took to one of China's largest social media platforms on Monday to address speculation over his non-appearance in a recent Inter Miami friendly in Hong Kong. Mon, 19 Feb 2024 14:49:10 GMT XIGXYS7ZVJKY7PDA2OVUXFA4HI https://www.reuters.com/sports/soccer/messi-sets-record-straight-over-hong-kong-absence-2024-02-19/Reuters运动的足球
China coast guard boarded Taiwanese boat near frontline islands, Taiwan saysChinese coast guard personnel briefly boarded a Taiwanese tourist boat near Taiwan-controlled islands next to China's coast on Monday, the government in Taipei said, in an escalation of tensions after China said it would carry out regular patrols. Mon, 19 Feb 2024 13:16:54 GMT ZXNGETU6KJNVDOVINIBXVPNFXE https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/china-coast-guard-boarded-taiwanese-boat-near-frontline-islands-taiwan-says-2024-02-19/Reuters世界亚太地区
China's securities watchdog opens ears for proposals to revive marketChina's securities watchdog said it held a series of seminars on Sunday and Monday with market participants who proposed tighter scrutiny of company listings and trading behaviour as part of efforts to revive market confidence. Mon, 19 Feb 2024 13:04:05 GMT 57MUA2M3ORIYLITBU2F3HPWRTQ https://www.reuters.com/markets/asia/chinas-securities-watchdog-opens-ears-proposals-revive-market-2024-02-19/Reuters可持续发展董事会、政策和法规
Exclusive: Turkish-Russian trade hit by fresh US sanctions threatA U.S. threat to hit financial firms doing business with Russia with sanctions has chilled Turkish-Russian trade, disrupting or slowing some payments for both imported oil and Turkish exports, according to seven sources familiar with the matter. Mon, 19 Feb 2024 12:32:16 GMT ZK3X3G7YUNMSHH2ULPOLIWTM2M https://www.reuters.com/markets/turkish- Russian-trade-hit-by-fresh-us-sanctions-threat-2024-02-19/Can Sezer, Nevzat Devranoglu, Dmitry Zhdannikov市场
